author: Conor Lally
title: Coronavirus: Man (24) is first to be charged under new Covid-19 laws
description: Court told Denis Constantin twice observed to have travelled more than 2km from home
content:
A man living in Co Wexford has become the first person to be charged under new regulations introduced last week in response to the Covid-19 crisis.
Denis Constantin (24), who is originally from Romania but is living in Enniscorthy, appeared before Gorey Dist… [+1158 chars]
